decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Proposed floor plan, dated 10/09/2015, received 29/09/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - All waste, refuse, and recycling bins shall be stored on-site and shall not be moved outside except to an awaiting vehicle after which they shall be immediately returned to within the site. No refuse or recyclable materials shall be stored outside the site.
Condition : 4 - No fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant shall be installed without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - All equipment and machinery within the unit shall be silenced if they produce continuous levels of more than 90 db(A) measured one metre from the equipment or machinery.
description: Change of use from light industrial warehouse to canine hydrotherapy centre
